original_title: Rodney Yee's Complete Yoga For Beginners: Yoga For Energy
overview: A perfect way to start the day, with Rodney Yee! These gentle yoga sequences will get your blood flowing and draw energy up and through the body.
tagline: Easy-to-follow series that builds strength & improves flexibility.
title: Rodney Yee's Complete Yoga For Beginners: Yoga For Energy
